EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - Minneapolis - 5/31
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Minneapolis. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Minneapolis, MN Wednesday, June 1, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/minneapolis]]>
Location: Day Block Event Center 1103 Washington Ave South Minneapolis, MN 55415 Room: East Room
Map & Directions <[[https://www.dayblockbrewing.com/location]]>
Parking: There is a garage at the Guthrie for public parking. There are a lot of meters on 11th Ave, or the 25 cent-per-hour meters on 3rd Street behind the building.
Questions? Contact Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
